metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12423 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
In Synapse before 0.31.2, unauthorised users can hijack rooms when there isno m.room.power_levels event in force.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12423` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 0.31.2+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.31.2+dfsg-1').
